select last_login_ip as loginIp, count(1) as frequency from member_info where 1=1
and last_login_ip = #{ip}
and date_format(last_login_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginDate},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(last_login_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%y%m%d')
group by last_login_ip
having count(1) >= #{count}
ORDER BY last_login_time desc

SELECT a.user_id memberId, a.user_name account, a.change_growth changes, a.type, b.vip_level vip, b.vip_growth growth FROM member_growth_record a LEFT JOIN member_info b on b.member_id = a.user_id WHERE a.type = 3 and a.user_id = #{memberId} and a.remark != "未达到保底系统降级"
